is a spa town on the north shore of Lake Titisee, in the
Train from Freiburg, 2 per hour to Titisee station, 1 per hour to Neustadt.
Walk or use the local buses. Or hire a bike.

value: name=Lake Titisee: a lot of pictures

Walking is the principal activity in summer, with a network of well marked routes. Usually you will find an inn somewhere
along the route!

Skiing takes over in winter, as long as there is enough snow.
A number of reasonably priced restaurants in Titisee serving traditional Black Forest fare. Also a Chinese restaurant!

value: Hotel Sonnenmatte. Family run hotel about a mile out of Titisee on the Neustadt road, bus 7257 every hour. Reasonable standard.
